name: Stuck in a Loop
description:
2 Player Local Coop

Accept the challenge and try to break the loop until you find your soul mate. Overcome different tasks in each level and raise the affection bar to the fullest. 

   

Grab your buddy next to you, regardless of playing with friends or total strangers. Find out how well you two actually match and try to fill the sympathy bar. Work together and synchronize to avoid mistakes. Asynchronous behavier will cost you points. Try  to communicate with each other!

The loop restarts after the time is up, but you will keep your current affection points.

Your goal is the party! Convince your coop-partner with the sickest dance moves and break the daily loop by filling the affection bar.
